channel.title: Err need help with some codes
channel.description:
kk how can i fix thelissas shop to sell phats first...
then how can i check the commands on a server im making?
Help Please...

item.title: Err need help with some codes
item.dc:creator: @armorstr armorstr
item.description:
@armorstr wrote:

for the other part, go to compile, if you have a choice, compile it. then do runserver, or if u have a choice on compile, run it from that. then go onto a moparscape, type 127.0.0.1, it should log in. then you can look at your server, first hand

Read full topic
item.source: Err need help with some codes

item.title: Err need help with some codes
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

For thesillais (or whatever the hell it is)… go into the file Shops.cfg in your server’s folder. You will see her shop in there. It should have some item #'s, along with quantities. Change the item #'s to the phat id’s.

EX:

shop = 6	Helmet_Shop.					2	2	1139	5	1137	3	1141	3	1143	2	1145	1	1155	4	1153	3	1157	3	1159	2	1161	1

See the item Id’s? and the quantities are the 3, 3, 2, 1, etc. Change the item Id’s and quantities. So like:

shop = 6	Helmet_Shop.					2	2	1040	300	1042	300	1044	300

Now it has 300 blue phats, 300 1042 phats… (white?) and 300 (red?) phats.

Can’t help with the other part, sorry.

Read full topic
